actions.text: Measure called up as privileged matter in House.

official_title: A resolution providing that the Speaker of the House certify the Report of the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct with respect to the proceedings against Hancho C. Kim, to the United States Attorney for the District of Columbia.

summary.text: Requires the Speaker of the House to certify to the United States Attorney for the District of Columbia the Report of the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct concerning proceedings against Hancho C. Kim.

titles.title: A resolution providing that the Speaker of the House certify the Report of the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct with respect to the proceedings against Hancho C. Kim, to the United States Attorney for the District of Columbia.
